item.title: Some fun with ST Writer on the Atari MegaSTe
item.description:
Inspired by a thread on AtariAge, I decided to write up my blog posts tonight on my Atari MegaSTe in ST Writer.

The Atari MegaSTe was released near the end of the Atari computer era with a 68000 cpu running at 16MHz in a case that separates the keyboard with â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
